segments.text: Can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I need to apply for a parking permit .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are you a professor ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What ? Are you kidding ? I'm only 22 years old !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I am kidding.But don't you know only professors and students with disabilitiescan apply for parking permits ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I know . I have a disability.My hip was broken last year . And I can't walk well .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , I'm sorry . I didn't know .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's alright . You didn't see me walk to the desk .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Here is the application form . I also need to see your student ID and your permission letter from the university .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My permission letter ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , the letter that certifies you have a disability.And it must certify your disability entitles you to a parking place .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I was told I should have the letter sent directly to your office .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . Or you can bring it yourself .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But I asked them to send it to you directly .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me look in the file then . Maybe we received it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My name is Derek Schneider , S - C - H - N - E - I - D - E - R .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , here it is.Alright . Then I just need your completed application form , and I will be able to process your request .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good . I will sit over there and fill out the form . I will give it to you in a few minutes.Oh , by the way , can I apply for any parking lot I want ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The form has a map on the back . You may specify your top four choices.We will give a spot in the lot that has an opening .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I see . Thank you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You're very welcome .
segments.speaker: S1
